text: Field hockey at the 2012 Summer Olympics took place in London, United Kingdom from 29 July to 11 August. There were 12 teams for both the men's and women's tournaments. The Netherlands won the women's tournament, and Germany won the men's tournament. == Men's tournament == Rank Team align=center align=center align=center 4 == Women's tournament == Rank Team align=center Netherlands align=center align=center 4 == References == Category:2012 Summer Olympics
title: Field hockey at the 2012 Summer Olympics
